document.text:
From: Martin Weinberg <1 
To:' 
r     
Subject: Re: 19 Cr. 490 (RMB) - Discovery Production 
Date: Wed, 31 Jul 2019 22:29:34 +0000 
Thanks 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 31, 2019, at 6:11 PM, 
Counsel, 
) < 
wrote: 
The Government's first discovery production in this case has been loaded onto the drive you provided this afternoon 
and is ready for pickup at our office. If you are sending a  runner to pick up the production, he or she should just ask for 
the envelope with Michael Miller's name on it. I've also attached a copy of the accompanying discovery and disclosure 
letter to this email. 
Please let me know if you have any difficulty accessing the discovery on the drive. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
<2019.07.31 Epstein Discovery Letter.pdf> 
EFTA00030516
